title: Standing Figure
credit_line: Gift of Aluminum Company of America
provenance_text:
Fritz Wotruba [1907-1975]; Swetzoff Gallery, Boston, MA; G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, until June 26, 1965; G. David Thompson estate, June 1965 until November 1966; G. David Thompson sale, Parke-Bernet, New York, NY, March 23, 1966, no. 20 (not sold) [1]; The Aluminum Company of America, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1966 until October 19, 1967  [2]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute Pittsburgh, PA, October 1967.

Notes:
[1]. ] "The G. David Thompson Collection of Twentieth Century Paintings and Sculptures" ; this lot was included in the first day of the auction, on March 23, 1966.
[2]. Part of the Alcoa Collection of Contemporary Art.
